title: Curriculum
description: A highly professional, accurately spelled, and well-structured learning path. YOU MUST USE STRICT, FLAWLESS ENGLISH TERMINOLOGY. ABSOLUTELY NO GIBBERISH OR TYPOS (e.g., never output nonsense like 'inkilligance' or 'Unerer'). Double-check all terminology against real-world educational standards before responding.

curriculum.description: An ordered list of chronological phases for the learning path. Must strictly progress from beginner to advanced.

phase_title.description: The title of the phase. Must be professionally written and accurately spelled. Must follow the format 'Phase X: Title'.

courses.description: A list of specific, real-world courses or modules within this phase.

course_title.description: The clear, professionally named title of the specific course. Must be a recognized, accurate real-world subject name with perfect English spelling.

topics.description: A list of concise, real-world sub-topics or concepts covered in this course. NO HALLUCINATIONS. Use standard professional vocabulary.

items.description: A specific, accurately spelled technical topic. Limit to 5-7 words maximum. Only use recognized, real-world terminology. Do not end with a period.
